name: In The Steps of Raijin
description:
In The Steps of Raijin is a puzzle platformer with chaining electrical reactions - place pylons and avoid the electrified traps to get to the end!

Built with Game Dev_onian, Stuart @ Nerdy Canuck, and thunder413 for the 2021 Alberta Game Jam.

Alberta Game Jam - Fantastic Experience-  Thank YOU Alberta Game Jam for such an Awesome Weekend.
